content.body: TabAtkins: re the slides problem in the Delegates room: if you click on "SLIDE X OF 38", you get a menu that allows you to go to any slide, including the ones after 32.

content.body: Ah ok *that* does work, but I would have had no idea how to do that. (And now the slides are out of presentation order.)
